meanings.definition: A small, motile male gamete produced by certain organisms.
meanings.sent1: The microgametes swam swiftly towards the egg.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the microgametes under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The microgametes had a race to fertilize the egg.
meanings.sent4: The microgametes were like tiny messengers delivering genetic information.
meanings.sent5: Under the lens, the microgametes looked like tiny, determined swimmers.

meanings.definition: The male reproductive cell of a microorganism.
meanings.sent1: Each microgametes carries genetic material for reproduction.
meanings.sent2: The microgametes of the bacteria were released into the environment.
meanings.sent3: The microgametes threw a party to celebrate their role in reproduction.
meanings.sent4: In the world of microorganisms, the microgametes were the key to continuation.
meanings.sent5: The microgametes were like tiny messengers of life in the microorganism world.
